message.body: Steve!!!
Phuong!!
I need an answer.
The guy asked me to go to his office party tomorrow and then out afterwards to meet up with his friends.
I don't know at this point.
Office party is more than just friends....
If it's not what you want, just let him know.
Ahhhhh!
You think so?
Shots
*shit
I've never been to one!
Yeah, most people either come themselves, bring family or significant other. From my experience at least.
Have you talked to him?
Oh man...
About the stuff?
Yeah
No, I'm not sure how to even bring that up.
That's the confusing part.
We mostly talk about superficial stuff.
Like movies, dogs, and how my day is.
And then he asks me to go out and now to his office party.
Yet puts out a disclaimer that it's a strange thing to ask.
Like he knows!
Maybe he does. Take this opportunity to tell him. Hey, I'm not really in a place to hang out like that. Or something along those lines.
And that won't be mean or hurtful?
I mean you're gonna have to tell him. It depends on how he perceives it.
I still have that part of me that is doubtful, questioning if it's just in my head. Like this might be just be a friendly thing. He might just want someone to go with to an office function.
It absolutely could be, but in order for you to feel comfortable you have to talk to him about it.
It's all speculation until you know how he really feels.
Like the fact that he said it's a strange thing to ask makes me think that he acknowledges that it might be weird for me.
I know you're right.
I know it's tough, but it'll be easier.
I'm just not good with this stuff.
Ugh see what I mean when I said I'm not good with this stuff???
Hahah.
When will it be easier?
Easier when you talk to him I mean. And make sure everything is casual.
How do I make it casual?
After you talk with him and everything is clear.
What if it's really uncomfortable...
Isn't it uncomfortable now?
It's fine when we talk about normal stuff.
It's uncomfortable when he asks me to go out to stuff like might resemble a date.
*that might
You could also play it off like a joke and see what he says... Like, "is this a date???" Something like that
Oh did I tell you we've be we spoken over the phone???
It's only via FB message.
He asked me if he could call me sometimes and I said something along the lines of "sure", but never have Hom my number.
*gave him
*we've never spoken on the phone
So even if I joked about it, I don't think I could even tell because it's over FB message!
Oh I don't think I handled this right Steve.
It's alright. Just do what you think is best.
What am I good for if you can't talk to me? Lol
Sorry, I feel like I'm spazzing out a bit on you.

That's so sweet, thank you. Seriously, I really appreciate you listening and your advice :) it's hard for me. I don't talk to a lot if people about this because it's kind if uncomfortable and personal.
And I feel like I'm doing something bad.
I understand and I'm glad you feel comfortable coming to me. I do what I can to help, but sometimes I feel like I make it more confusing for you.
What are you doing that's bad?
Actually, you make it more clear. I need someone to get straight to the point because I tend to stray and go on tangents.
And you're a straight shooter so I get some focus.
I feel like I'm hurting someone.

In this situation, by talking to the guy and being friendly, I feel like I'm doing something wrong. Like if he does have intentions and I want to be friends, it's like I'm leading him on or something and I really don't want to. I just don't want anyone to feel like I'm wasting their time. Because that would be hurtful to me.
If he does like you, then he still enjoys talking to you, I think you'd be alright from both standpoints.
So this sux: ￼￼￼
Oh no! What happened? Hit something?
There was low pressure in one of my tires so I drove to put air in and then that happened :(
:/ looks like a puncture. Was there anything in the tire?
I don't know :( what would be in there that could do that?
Might've been a nail or something real sharp. Or it may have been from driving it while it was low, looks like there are a couple holes in a few spots.
Ugh seriously. Why???
Were you able to get it repaired?
I parked it in front of my sister's house and asked my brother-in-law if he can look at it to see if I should get it replaced or if it could be fixed.
Waiting on word from him.
